mods.abstract: Image of a group of nine young men and women sitting and standing, [possibly at a sporting event outdoors]. Many are holding Coca-Cola drink cups and/or chip bags. Two women sitting at the front of the group have a blanket draped over their knees.
mods.note: "100%," "clubs," "6[4]" is written on the front of the photograph.
mods.accessCondition: Digital copy created for preservation and access purposes. Available by request for research purposes only. All other uses must be cleared by patron through copyright holders. For further details contact ascproj@yorku.ca
